snippet: Serena Williams outlasted gritty Dutchwoman Kiki Bertens in two tough sets on Friday to reach the French Open final, where she will play fourth seeded Spaniard Garbine Muguruza with her 22nd grand slam singles title at stake....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams outlasted gritty Dutchwoman Kiki Bertens in two tough sets on Friday to reach the French Open final, where she will play fourth seeded Spaniard Garbine Muguruza with her 22nd grand slam singles title at stake.

headline.print_headline: Serena Outlasts Gritty Bertens to Reach French Open Final
headline.main: Serena Outlasts Gritty Bertens to Reach French Open Final
